name: Pixel Coloring-Color by Number
description:
Pixel Coloring is one of the MOST FUN and RELAXING color by number games on mobile! It is designed for all ages. Just choose from tons of beautiful pixel artworks and follow the numbers in pixel boxes to bring them to life. Everyone can complete super cool masterpieces in such an easy and relaxed way!

Join us in this colorful pixel art world! Explore the joy of coloring, uncover your artist potential, relieve daily stress and free your mind.

* Key features *

- Start coloring anytime & anywhere - no pencil, paper needed
- Easy & fun to paint images by number and wait for the surprise in the end!
- Tons of amazing coloring pages
- A variety of coloring themes for all tastes: people, food, animals, florals and many more
- Quick sharing. Show your artworks to friends on social networks!
- Pixel Art Camera to turn your photos into pixel arts.
- Useful coloring tools. Use bucket to paint multiple neighbouring cells of the same number

Be careful not to get too addicted!
